sheet_title: (E) Single-Fam. Res. Roof Pl. w/ Demo
prepared_by: ADU West / Ideal Designs — Oscar Sanchez
description: Existing single-family residence roof plan with demolition scope. Shows the existing 1,854 sq.ft. SFR roof outline and identifies two trellis structures (378 sq.ft. total) to be demolished to make way for the new detached ADU.
key_content: Demolition scope: 2 existing trellis structures, 378.0 sq.ft. total, to be demo'd
Demo notes: contractor to relocate reusable materials, protect existing structures, provide bracing/shoring
Designer: Oscar Sanchez, DBA / ADU Class, (714) 794-9167
NOT SHOWN: roof material or fire class

drawing_zones.content: Demolition Notes (full paragraph) and Demo Legend (3 line types)
(E) S.F.R. Roof Plan w/ Demolition at 1/4" = 1'-0" — existing residence footprint with roof outline and 2 trellis areas marked for demo
2-(E) Trellis TO BE DEMO (378.0 SQ.FT.) label and ADU West / Ideal Designs logos
Title block: PAGE A1.1, designer info, job number, date
